entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RiscV64 build fail #97791
  • [WASM] - Cache never used when dotnet is executed from within a web worker #97787
  • BigInteger.ModPow asserting in SubtractSelf #97780
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.RefreshOcspResponse_BeforeExpiration test failure #97779
  • Calling RequestReJIT in the profiler API can cause a deadlock #97771
  • [wasm] Not opening the browser when starting a Wasm Browser App from VS #97770
  • WriteXorExecute is not working in combination with PerfMaps #97765
  • [NativeAOT] Assert in ILC when compiling System.Data.DataSetExtensions.Tests in Debug build #97758
  • Performance degradation of the X509Certificate2's private key constructor when running in Linux #97753
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Assert failure in PutThumb2BlRel24 #97750
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Possible problems with building tests #97745
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close() ignores disabled HUPCL flag on Linux #97741
  • Respecting EnumMemberAttribute in AOT'd applications #97737
    9.0.0
  • MemoryCache creates lots of tasks that cause CPU/Memory spikes on compaction. #97736

Closed

  • Assertion failed 'hwintrinsicChild->isContained()' in 'System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives+ScaleBOperator #97688
    9.0.0
  • iOS app crashes on release mode when performing a .Sum on a List of 20k+ items #97625
    9.0.0
  • Question: Is there built in ToUpper() functionality for System.Guid and other value types ? #97781
  • [API Proposal]: NotAllowedValuesAttribute #97785
  • HttpClient Support Data URLs (scheme data:) #97772
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient correct way to avoid sending SNIs #97444
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl 5.0.0 DLL for net461 targets .NET Framework 4.7 #97728
  • Consider mapping more regex sets to AnyClass #80123
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] undefined references to __ResolveVirtualFunction_System.IO.Stream__[Begin/End][Read/Write] #97749
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] undefined symbol: NYI_Assert #97748
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Interlocked tests fail #97730
  • Get InvocationList of MulticastDelegate without any allocation #41849
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] MutexTests.AbandonExisting timeout #91547
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Frozen Set and Collection Literals #97760
  • IPv6 uri with leading zeros makes it IPv4 look like #97719
  • Add test coverage for server OCSP stapling. #96791
    9.0.0
  • [browser] improve behavior after exit #94906
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasi] Fix ALC support, See the WASI comment in `ves_icall_System_Reflection_Assembly_InternalLoad`. #95137
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors for PyTorch: few comments #27973
    Future
  • Consider dynamic growth of tensors along the outermost dimension #28381
    Future
  • Consider supporting TensorFlow's sparse tensor shape #28384
    Future
  • Add slow reflection-based generic tensor arithmetic #28385
    Future
  • Consider tensor construction from vector subscripts (eg: indices sequences) #28386
    Future
  • Consider specification of lower bounds as an option for Tensors #28387
    Future
  • Make indicies stepping more effecient #28389
    Future
  • Add parameter validation to Tensors #28390
    Future
  • Add TensorView<T> `ref struct` like Span<T>, avoid coupling to `Tensor<T>` in algorithms- #28392
    Future
  • Add new overloads to Clone() methods on subtypes of Tensor<T> #28393
    Future
  • Connection reset by peer error when sending requests using HttpClient #95516

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ILLink.CodeFixProvider.csproj #97796
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Spanify parts of IL reading in ILCompiler #97794
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove built-in COM interop support from Mono runtime #97789
    area-Interop-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix memory leaks in the llvm backend. #97788
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • Enable use of RestoreConfigFile property in source-build #97778
    needs-area-label
  • Fix handling invalid collection items in configuration #97777
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] fix WebWorkerTest.JSSynchronizationContext_Send_Post_Items_Cancellation #97775
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Late cast expansion: multiple candidates #97773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Unblock `RandomTests.Shared_ParallelUsage` #97769
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • [wasm] Fix hanging on subsequent `dotnet new` #97764
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Set DisableArcadeExcludeFromBuildSupport & support DotNetBuildTests flag #97762
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Bail out on IMAGE_REL_BASED_THUMB_BRANCH24 with >24-bit addends #97756
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] install rejection handler on workers #97752
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use VM's copy of daccess.h #97751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed wrong comment in XxHash64 #97747
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Run a few llvm passes on the emitted methods to reduce m… #97744
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Ensure edge likelihoods 1 #97740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #97738
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #97783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix passing of byref arguments in mono_gsharedvt_constrai… #97721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove Unrestored/UnrestoredTypeKey flags #97674
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update latest roslyn version to 4.8 #97767
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove fgReplaceSwitchJumpTarget; increase usage of fgReplaceJumpTarget #97664
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use VM's debugmacrosext.h #97754
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete unused bits of some headers #97761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix method overload resolution for arguments of type array in debugger's eval #97776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add Arm64 encoding for group SVE_DF_2A to SVE_DK_3A #97774
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT] Allow linux-arm RIDs for NativeAOT publishing #97757
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Disable inline TLS on linux-arm, it is not implemented #97746
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts #97701
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix compilation error with generic type attributes #97717
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.3
  • [mono][aot] Fix support for files with non-ascii characters on windows #92279
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Implement ResolveVirtualFunction helper #97755
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Fix RhpLockCmpXchg16 #97743
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add APIs for allocation-free delegate invocation list inspection #97683
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Establish loop invariant base case based on IR #97182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono][interp] Disable inlining into bblocks that are detected as dead early during codegen #97514
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add the barebones support for using embedded masking with AVX512 #97675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Emit correct unwind codes for VPOP #97710
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Speed up cmake configure checks on Mono Windows build. #97303
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] improve behavior after exit, better docs #97651
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Mark all base types and interfaces as RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle open types to appear in interface maps #97733
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • STJ: Avoid duplicate initialization of required or init-only properties #97726
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for ref-readonly in the .NET interop source generators #97720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • Test #96806
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix decode_value_compute_size #97568
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts #97702
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • JIT: remove fallthrough limitations from redundant branch optimizer #97722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add basic Vector3 SIMD intrinsics #97416
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Return all error messages instead of throwing on the first error in linker tests #97605
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][mt] Unify multithreading switches #97560
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add separate properties for keep-in-sync versions #97643
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add API call for Arm64 Sve.LoadVectorNonFaulting #97695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Convert fast path of ValueType.GetHashCode to managed #97590
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][mt] Move FeatureWasmThreads to Directory.Build.props #97548
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • mark-ro-instrumentation #97482
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve BBJ_COND to BBJ_ALWAYS conversion in fgUpdateFlowGraph #97681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [mono] Save trimmed methods list to a file #97705
    needs-area-label
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Support for ARM32 in NativeAOT #833

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement implicit shadow tail calls #2501
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Conflict resolution doesn't use PackageConflictPlatformManifests for self-contained applications - leading to unwanted files and less than optimal perf. #38425

Closed

  • `xunit` template fails to restore #38386
  • SDK 6.0.1 (Hidden) Access Denied errors #23138

PullRequests

Created

  • No drive enumerations Fixes #38050 #38436
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add missing SDK dependency to global.json #38426
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the #nullable disable directive #38406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Port dependency changes to main #38387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update to the Jan 8.0.1 released version of the runtime #38344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] vstest fix source build #38428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Support wildcards when ignoring baseline TFMs #38374
    Area-ApiCompat, 9.0.1xx
  • IP: .NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Remove unused StringWriter from GenerateToolSettingsFile Task #38378
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Open issue: relax requirement that type be enumerable to participate in collection expressions #7744
  • Champion: fixed-sized buffers #1314
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822

PullRequests

Created

  • Determine element type for write-only CollectionBuilder collection types #7895
  • Update `Lock` object speclet #7891

Merged

  • Update README.md #7894

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582
  • Collection expressions: spread conditional expression #7864

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quote completion improvements #71898
  • Test plan for "`Lock` object" feature #71888

Closed

  • CallerArgumentExpression for out arguments #71901
  • Rationalize FlushAsync taking a CancellationToken in `net8.0` #71580
  • Raw String Literal Concatenation Does Not Preserve NewLines #71895
  • Collection expressions wrapping can't be configured #71891
  • Remove RoslynImageCatalogGuid #6078
    Backlog
  • "Extract interface" generates invalid code for read-write properties #71640
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade Language Server to run on .NET 8 #71903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #71900
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move to Preview 4 image #71899
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable autoBraceSurround on 17.9 P2 tests #71897
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Provide overloads to avoid unnecessary boxing #71894
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fail tests if errors are reported #71893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Misc fixes #71892
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update `Lock` object feature status #71889
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allocate exactly the space needed when creating a sourcetext #71886
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove support for base extensions #71883
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update publishing configuration for new alpine linux package name #71902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Improve and clarify the logic around project syncing" #71873
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve error location of missing `object.ToString()` for concatenation #71890
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure we don't leak the request info if a request is cancelled #71737
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Recreate the get accessor when extracting an interface member #71797
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move from out parameters to a return tuple #71885
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove cloud cache system #71887
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use extensions to make reading/writing streams easier #71882
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix nrt annotation #71884
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove pointless parameter #71875
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Simplify the work with generated BoundNodes and emit the xml comments as doc comment in the generated code file #71601
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Helping runtime diagnose a CI bug #71724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Using Nullable Disabled semantic model to compute semantic classification #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fetch all changed projects in a single sync call #71874
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve syncing of project cones. #71826
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add `Lock` object feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Switch the BuildHost to build with net6.0 again #71881
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change an ApplyChangeToWorkspace overload to remove some async #71830
    Area-IDE
  • Write and read uniformly in objectwriter/objectreader #71877
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Sit object reader/writer on top of pipes. #71880
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #53744
  • Invalid List Of Components when using "required" keyword #53742
  • Isolated JS for RazorComponentResult #53741
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #53740
  • Add appsettings.json JSON schemas for areas that aren't already in the schema store #53737
  • Kestrel occasionally losing zero-size GRPC responses #53736
  • ControllerBase.Created returns NoContent and Ok results #53734
  • .Net 8 Blazor Web App Identity Framework Help #53732
  • OnConnectedAsync ist sometimes called with the wrong HubConnectionContext #53731
  • Blazor Server page crashing after reconnect with multiple clients #53730
    8.0.x
  • Quickgrid table design problem #53729
  • Configuration Bind error with common pattern in PublishTrimmed #53728
  • Perf regression: fortunes, https, mvc #53727
  • Perf improvement: json #53726
  • Quarantine MouseOverAndMouseOut_CanTrigger #53724
    9.0-preview3
  • Quarantine CounterPageCanUseThreads #53723
    9.0-preview3
  • blazor server firefox Uncaught (in promise) WebSocket is not in the OPEN state #53721
  • IdentityCookieAuthenticationBuilderExtensions causing 404 Not Found #53719

Closed

  • The content of nuget package is not being copied to the project source code folder physically. They are only appears as if under the project folder #53747
  • Blazor Server folder publish fails for specific configurations #53714
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json, json #53626
  • Error AuthenticationStateProvider in Net8 #53651
  • Api endpoint does not properly unescape strange string #53701
  • Not rendering full page #53527
  • Pls enhance the docs about Action injection with FromServices #53722
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction, plaintext #53615
  • Perf regression: json, json #53648
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53713
  • In RCL, how to deploy reusable .scss files using nuget in .NET Blazor project instead of npm while can be referenced (using @import) by other .scss within project folder? #53682
  • Minimal API with IFormFile throws when request body is missing and Content-Type header is missing or empty #53630

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53748
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Fix `@key` not being respected for interactive WebAssembly components after publish #53746
    area-blazor
  • Quarantine RST_STREAM_IncompleteRequest_AdditionalWindowUpdateFrame_ConnectionAborted #53745
    area-networking
  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #53735
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53500
    area-infrastructure, area-mvc, 9.0-preview2
  • Return unsuccessful when trying to read form and request does not have body #53680
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview2
  • Quarantine e2e components tests #53725
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • Enable use of RestoreConfigFile property in source-build #53738
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • [release/9.0-preview1] Package debs with xz compression #53718
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Package debs with xz compression #53717
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Add milestones for preview2 #53743
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Prevent NRE in ExternalLogin.razor #53222
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/8.0] Fix navigation for anchor inside <svg> element #53541
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53542
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] Fix duplicate route detection of actions with route parameters #53604
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Running an iOS app using the command 'sudo dotnet build -t:Run -f net8.0-ios' gets stuck #20280
  • ThumbColor and OnColor property is not applied for switch #20278
  • Unable to customize the Datepicker calendar, TImepicker view and picker drop down view #20277
  • Unable to change the border color for the DatePicker, Timepicker and Picker #20276
  • Re-Enabled for iOS ViewWithMarginSetsFrameAndDesiredSizeCorrectly[SearchBar] #20275
  • IsEnabled=False on .NET MAUI ShellContent and CollectionView not working on iOS (still enabled) #20274
  • Previously selected Shellitem cannot be reselected #20273
  • Bug in VS 17.8.3 - MAUI - for windows .net8.0 #20272
  • Pages not appearing in .NET MAUI app #20271
  • Unable to change the border color for the entry and editor #20270
  • Applink makes app hang after using back button in Android with MAUI 8 #20267
  • [X] Compile bindings with explicit (non-relative) source #20266
  • App Icon doesn't appear in window title bar #20265
  • Android does not update visibility of a visual element if it has a Shadow #20264
  • Compatibility AbsoluteLayout is broken on Android #20262
  • ListView + DataTemplateSelector + HasUnevenRows issue on iOS #20261
  • The keyboard hides the Entry when the IsPassword property is set to true on iOS. #20259

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update versions #20279
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add visual test support for multiple devices for a single platform #20256

Updated

  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migration class name can clash with column data types #32983
  • scaffolded one-to-many property names generate with incorrect name #32981
  • Stop referencing the query from ProjectionBindingExpression in the shaper #32980
  • Review our shaper expression visitation in visitors #32979
    9.0.0
  • Set operation over subquery projecting a collection throws because of client evaluation #32977
  • Filtering by Contains with HierarchyId and AsSplitQuery is not working #32976
    8.0.x
  • The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #32972
    8.0.x
  • Stack Overflow Error in .NET 8.0 in EF Core with Large Table #32971
  • Spell Check has issues with field names create by Scaffold-DbContext (C#) #32970
  • Returning `SqlFragmentExpression` from `HasTranslation` doesn't work (switches to client evaluation) #32969

Closed

  • Invalid column name 'key' in SQL Server JSON query #32910
    9.0.0-preview1
  • Little nitpick with the documentation of OperationException #32934
    9.0.0-preview2
  • ComplexTypeBulkUpdatesSqlServerTest failing on main #32786
    9.0.0-preview1
  • LINQ Contains with concatenated columns generates OPENJSON with incorrect varchar length #32965
  • CVE-2024-0056 Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and System.Data.SqlClient SQL Data Provider Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability #32950
  • Loading specific columns without creating additional mapping classes #32935
  • Scaffolding a DbContext generates multiple warnings of "Non-nullable properties are uninitialized". #32792
  • Can I use several ExecutionStrategy ? #32907

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] NuGet package readme files #32982
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query #32978
  • Fix daily build selection image. #32975
  • Cleanup asserts #32968
  • Fix to #32939 - Accidentally using field instead of property for JSON metadata produce hard to understand exception #32966

Merged

  • NuGet package readme files #32961
  • Fix typo #32973

Updated

  • Stop throwing eagerly when looking up a ValueGenerator #32930
  • Proposed fix to #7172 - Consider non-default column collation in table variable #29518
    blocked

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • --source-only switch: doc and default behavior #18469

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian11 only, SDK dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-alpha.1.24070.3.deb installing failed with error: archive 'aspnetcore-runtime/aspnetcore-targeting-pack-9.0.0-alpha.1.24068.16-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #18314

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop making src modifications to every repo's NuGet.config #18478
  • Stop using OverrideTargetRid, use TargetOS/TargetArchitecture instead #18476
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18466

Merged

  • Propagate DotNetBuildSourceOnly to repo build invocations #18479
  • Allow .doc files as binaries in the VMR #18475
  • Set PortableBuild correctly for non source-only builds #18474
  • Delete dead code for Platform property #18473

Updated

  • Add preview 1 to the table #18392
  • Separate out the test exclusions that apply to stable SDKs when we're… #18424
  • Update arcade and add support for --build-tests switch #18464
  • Add VMR unified build pipelines #18409
  • Support for short stack builds. #18463
